scripts.compile: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile
scripts.test: npm run compile && npx hardhat test && npm run lint
scripts.coverage: npm run compile && npx hardhat coverage && npm run lint && npm run compile
scripts.deploy-token-kovan: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat run scripts/1_deploy-token.js --network kovan && npx hardhat run scripts/2_publish_contract_definition_to_etherscan.js --network kovan
scripts.deploy-token-rinkeby: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat run scripts/1_deploy-token.js --network rinkeby && npx hardhat run scripts/2_publish_contract_definition_to_etherscan.js --network rinkeby
scripts.deploy-token-mainnet: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat run scripts/1_deploy-token.js --network mainnet && npx hardhat run scripts/2_publish_contract_definition_to_etherscan.js --network mainnet
